 :star: 
 Doors had too many axe holes, guest in room 237 was far too rowdy, whole place felt stuck in the 1920s."},"accessory":{"type":"image","image_url":"https://is5-ssl.mzstatic.com/image/thumb/Purple3/v4/d3/72/5c/d3725c8f-c642-5d69-1904-aa36e4297885/source/256x256bb.jpg","alt_text":"Haunted hotel image"}},{"type":"section","block_id":"section789","fields":[{"type":"mrkdwn","text":"*Average Rating*
1.0"}]}]}

name: Typeform Automation
title: Typeform Automation
description:
This automation exposes a webhook (HTTP Post endpoint) that you can point your Typeform/waitlist form to. All submissions are processed, formatted, split and send into a Slack channel of your choice, and on email via SendGrid. This can be extended then to any channel - your CRM, Notion database, excel sheet etc.

- To configure : Slack channel/web hook details, SendGrid email + API Token, function to format incoming submissions.
